mapper.select: select id, type, level, teaching_workload_target AS teachingWorkloadTarget, research_workload_target AS researchWorkloadTarget from workload_target where id = #{id}

select id, department, type, level, teaching_workload_target AS teachingWorkloadTarget, research_workload_target AS researchWorkloadTarget from workload_target where level = #{level} and type = #{type} and department = #{department}
